content.text:
Which of the following testing methods should be used to evaluate the uniformity and compactness of crushed stone fill?<image 1>

A. Static penetration test
B. Light power penetration
C. Heavy power penetration
D. Standard penetration test

To evaluate the uniformity and compactness of crushed stone fill, the most appropriate testing method would be the Standard Penetration Test (SPT). This method is specifically designed to measure the density and compactness of soil samples, including crushed stone fill. The SPT involves driving a penetrometer into the soil sample and measuring the penetration resistance, which is inversely proportional to the density of the soil.

Therefore, the correct answer is:

D. Standard penetration test
Now, output the final answer and nothing else:
